title: Baking a Chocolate Cake
story: Jennifer, can you come here, please? Okay, mommy. I'm baking a chocolate cake. A chocolate cake? Yay! Can you get the eggs, please? Sure, mommy. We'll mix it in this bowl. I want to help.
summary: A young girl named Jennifer helps her mommy bake a chocolate cake and eagerly participates in the process.
image: An image of Jennifer and her mommy in the kitchen, with a mixing bowl and ingredients on the counter.
